body_html: That explains the "Access is denied" error. The path argument to tf.python_io.TFRecordWriter() must be a file name (typically the name of a file that does not exist) and not a directory name.
body_text: That explains the "Access is denied" error. The path argument to tf.python_io.TFRecordWriter() must be a file name (typically the name of a file that does not exist) and not a directory name.
body: That explains the "Access is denied" error. The `path` argument to [`tf.python_io.TFRecordWriter()`](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/python_io/TFRecordWriter#__init__) must be a *file* name (typically the name of a file that does not exist) and not a directory name.
